subject: Medicine and Health
Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Since 1998, the N.B.A. player Dikembe Mutombo has invested millions in a hospital in Congo, his African homeland, that will have its ceremonial opening on Sept. 2.
snippet: Since 1998, the N.B.A. player Dikembe Mutombo has invested millions in a hospital in Congo, his African homeland, that will have its ceremonial opening on Sept. 2.
